post.author: 임기순
post.content:
I am looking for a suitable consultant for below said job description that we have with our clients. Hope you would be interested. Please forward you updated detailed resume. If you are not available, I would really appreciate if you could please refer me your friend or a colleague.
TITLE: APPLICATION DEVELOPER TYPE: CONTRACT DURATION: 6 months CITY: TORONTO
DESCRIPTION: Description: It's a development role to help with multiple prime brokerage and GEF projects. You will have to have experience with supporting a production system and have strong troubleshooting and analytical skills.
EXPERIENCE: Skills experience: Oracle, Some Sybase, Strong Unix, Java, Web technologies, experience in Windows environment, and MUST have Financial Exp Added skills: Bonus: Experience with applications on Equity Finance and Prime Brokerage area Bonus: Experience with a vendor (LineData) product called "Fund Manager".
NOTES: * Please ignore this email if you do not fit into this position. Your resume was picked up on the skills keywords search. As a result you have received this email. We regret inconvenience. * When you reply, please put the job title in the subject line. * If you do not have an up dated resume with us, please attach one to your reply. * If you know anyone else who may be interested have them send a resume to me. * Please monitor our web site for other job/contract openings at http://www.tdm.ca/
Thank You
Recruiter: KETAN PATEL 300-3 Church St. Toronto Ontario M5E 1M2 Canada TDM@TDMTECH.COM WWW.TDMTECH.COM TEL: 416-777-0007 FAX: 416-777-1117
post.title: Oracle Developer - Contract - TDM
